gen:link.msg:message: `TuitionCourseTrainingExamFees` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TuitionCourseTrainingExamFees')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TuitionCourseTrainingExamFees return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTuitionCourseTrainingExamFeesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
